hero.title: Start Your Digital Project Ultra Fast!
hero.description: We help you bring your digital vision to life with our expertise in web, mobile, and software development.

process.title: Our Development Process
process.description: We follow a proven 5-step process to ensure your project is delivered on time, within budget, and exceeds your expectations.

steps.title: Discovery & Planning
steps.description: We start by understanding your business goals, target audience, and project requirements. This phase includes detailed discussions, research, and creating a comprehensive project roadmap.

steps.title: Design & Development
steps.description: Our team creates wireframes, designs, and prototypes before moving to development. We follow industry best practices and use the latest technologies to build robust, scalable solutions.

steps.title: Testing & Quality Assurance
steps.description: We conduct thorough testing across different devices and platforms to ensure your project is bug-free, secure, and performs optimally under various conditions.

steps.title: Deployment & Launch
steps.description: Once approved, we deploy your project to production environments, ensuring a smooth transition. We handle all technical aspects of the launch process to minimize downtime.

steps.title: Ongoing Support & Optimization
steps.description: Our relationship doesn't end at launch. We provide ongoing maintenance, support, and continuous improvements to keep your digital solution running smoothly and effectively.

requirements.title: Our Collaboration Requirements
requirements.description: For a successful partnership, we've established these key requirements to ensure smooth collaboration and exceptional results.

collaborationRequirements.title: Clear Project Goals
collaborationRequirements.description: Provide a clear description of your project goals, target audience, and expected outcomes. The more specific you are, the better we can tailor our solutions to your needs.

collaborationRequirements.title: Realistic Timeline
collaborationRequirements.description: Understand that quality digital projects take time. We work efficiently but won't compromise on quality. Typical projects take 2-6 months depending on complexity.

collaborationRequirements.title: Appropriate Budget
collaborationRequirements.description: Have a realistic budget that aligns with your project scope. Quality development requires investment. We'll help you prioritize features to match your budget constraints.

collaborationRequirements.title: Timely Feedback
collaborationRequirements.description: Commit to providing timely feedback during the development process. This ensures we stay on track and can make adjustments quickly without delaying the project.

collaborationRequirements.title: Content Preparation
collaborationRequirements.description: Be prepared to provide necessary content (text, images, videos) in a timely manner. Content delays are a common cause of project timeline extensions.

collaborationRequirements.title: Designated Decision Maker
collaborationRequirements.description: Assign a primary point of contact who has authority to make decisions. Too many stakeholders without clear leadership can lead to confusion and delays.

clientProvisions.title: What You Should Provide
clientProvisions.description: To ensure a faster and more efficient development process, please prepare the following materials before we begin:

categories.title: Brand Assets
items: Logo files in vector format (SVG, AI, EPS)
Brand color palette with hex codes

categories.title: Technical Access
items: Domain registrar access (or ability to update DNS)
Hosting account credentials (if using existing hosting)
Third-party service credentials (analytics, marketing tools, etc.)

support.title: Technologies We Support
support.description: We work with a wide range of technologies to deliver the best solutions for your digital project.
support.noTechnologiesFound: No technologies found matching your search.

form.heading: Start Your Project
form.description: Fill out this form to help us understand your project needs and provide you with an accurate estimate.

success.title: Project Submitted
success.description: Your project details have been received and sent to our team.

error.title: Submission Error
error.description: There was an issue submitting your project. Please try again.
error.unexpectedDescription: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

validation.positive: Budget amount must be a positive number.

options.milestone: Milestone - Payment upon completing specific project stages
options.completion: Completion - Full payment upon project completion
